message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is below my minimum.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still aiming to keep my spending within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate further and consider $11,000 as a compromise?
